article.description: Brian Bernardi scored 23 points, Ameen Tanksley added 18 and Hofstra beat Appalachian State 86-80 on Sunday in the Madison Square Garden Holiday Festival.
article.headline: Hofstra beats Appalachian State 86-80 at MSG
article.linkText: Hofstra beats Appalachian State 86-80 at MSG
article.story: NEW YORK -- Brian Bernardi scored 23 points, Ameen Tanksley added 18 and Hofstra beat Appalachian State 86-80 on Sunday in the Madison Square Garden Holiday Festival. Tanskley hit a 3 as the shot clock expired with 31 seconds to play to give the Pride (6-2) an 84-77 lead. He made two free throws 10 seconds later to give Hofstra a nine-point lead. Juan'ya Green added 17 points for Hofstra, which won its third straight, and Rokas Gustys had 15 points and 12 rebounds. Green and Bernardi both were 3 for 5 from 3-point range as the Pride went 9 of 18 from long range. Frank Eaves had a career-high 38 points for the Mountaineers (2-6), who have lost six of seven. Eaves was 6 of 12 from 3-point range and the Mountaineers finished 11 of 25 from beyond the arc.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
